inclusion.criterion: Finished active cancer treatment at least three months ago
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Overweight or obese and do not exercise daily
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No physical limitation to do mild to moderate physical activities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a smart phone with Wi-Fi internet connection at home
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to accept random study assignment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to wear a Fitbit band for five weeks every single day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to have an Echo speaker installed in your home and use the digital voice assist for four weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to receive daily text messages on your phone for four weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide us with access to your Fitbit physical activities data
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Already doing moderate to high physical activities in their daily life (rapid screener)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planning to relocate within the next 4-5 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has MDD, but is on anti-depressants and has a HAM-D score of 20. She does not have any physical limitations to do mild to moderate physical activities.
